author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2016-8-26 17:24 编辑 

Tomcc：Suggestion: don't this, disabling Comfort in VR because you have "VR legs", then trying Comfort when you're dizzy
Tomcc：建议：如果当你在使用VR时，若感到眩晕不舒适，请停下并休息或稍后再使用，因为你有“VR晕腿症”http://www.polygon.com/virtual-r ... nausea-make-it-stop
Tomcc：VR can definitely make you dizzy, picking intense, not knowing your limits and blaming it on the game for not saving you isn't smart.
Tomcc：VR肯定能让你（有眩晕症的人）感到头晕，分不清虚实，若不知道自己的适应能力，还是指责游戏的错，这不是很明智的作为
Tomcc：PS "VR Legs" is as real as "break in" for headphones and gold plated HDMI improvements :D
Tomcc：PS：“VR晕腿症”，是沉迷于虚拟，分不清虚实，就像一个突破了耳机，突破了局限的HDMI接口的世界
